body: Hello. It's been a long time since I was on here and since I hope to be more active in the near future, I think you should get to know me. So ask away!
body_tagged: Hello. It's been a long time since I was on here and since I hope to be more active in the near future, I think you should get to know me. So ask away!
title: Matic's AMA

replies.body:
YOU!!!

Hey famo, how are ya? Remember me? ;)

What do you think about the upcoming META to avicus called Atlas?

Do you plan on making any maps for it soon? I can teach you Avicus' XML, slight similarities and differences to OCN's.

Do you want to make a map with me?

How do you feel about OCN shutting down?

Do you plan on porting your OCN maps to here? If so, I can help ya convert and scribe the XML.

What suggestions do you have for Atlas?
replies.body_tagged:
YOU!!!

Hey famo, how are ya? Remember me? ;)

What do you think about the upcoming META to avicus called Atlas?

Do you plan on making any maps for it soon? I can teach you Avicus' XML, slight similarities and differences to OCN's.

Do you want to make a map with me?

How do you feel about OCN shutting down?

Do you plan on porting your OCN maps to here? If so, I can help ya convert and scribe the XML.

What suggestions do you have for Atlas?

replies.body:
>Hey famo, how are ya? Remember me? ;)

Yes I do. I'm ok, you?

>What do you think about the upcoming META to avicus called Atlas?

Don't know much about it since I haven't been active on here but excited to see what it will bring.

>Do you plan on making any maps for it soon? I can teach you Avicus' XML, slight similarities and differences to OCN's.

Currently I don't have any plans for making any maps.

>Do you want to make a map with me?

Read the answer above. If I was working on maps, we'd talk.

>How do you feel about OCN shutting down?

I've seen Overcast go through a lot of things in the time I was there. Found it ~3+ years ago (wasnt active the whole time though). A little bit sad its shutting down since it had one of the greatest communities which I stuck by for the longest. I've also done a lot for the community but it also tought me a lot of things that I can use online as well as in game.

>Do you plan on porting your OCN maps to here? If so, I can help ya convert and scribe the XML.

No. I'd like my OCN maps to stay a part of OCN's history. They were one of my contributions to the community.

>What suggestions do you have for Atlas?

Again, don't exactly know whats going on.

replies.body:
I'm well.

Well, go ahead and look at the topics from Admins regarding Atlas, a lot of stuff incoming man ;)

For more, you can take a look-see here: atlas.avicus.net

Anyway, on to random crap :P

What would you do if you had a tank?

What's your favorite food?

From 1-5, how much do you like Undertale?

Where the FU-- I mean... where've you been all these centuries?

Can you teach me the ins and outs of XML? How do I make blocks get immune from certain types of destruction like from players, creepers, fireballs.. TNT...

How do I do the Flop?

Do you like trains? I like trains.

replies.body: Omg, you are Clay Wars creator :o
replies.body_tagged: Omg, you are Clay Wars creator :o

replies.body:
>What would you do if you had a tank?

Honestly probably destruction spree.

>What's your favorite food?

Probably going to have to go with pizza. Theres a bunch of favs though.

>From 1-5, how much do you like Undertale?

The game? Don't play it.

>Where the FU-- I mean... where've you been all these centuries?

Focusing on real life things 

>Can you teach me the ins and outs of XML? How do I make blocks get immune from certain types of destruction like from players, creepers, fireballs.. TNT...

I've never been an XML person. Always had others do it for me.

>How do I do the Flop?

Can't explain this one. You just have to train a lot and at some point you will get it.

>Do you like trains? I like trains.

More of a turtle person myself

replies.body: He answered the bottom question already to me... damn... his maps are really awesome too...
replies.body_tagged: He answered the bottom question already to me... damn... his maps are really awesome too...

reply_to.body:
Why did you randomly make Clay Wars?
Plan to make any maps for Avicus soon?
reply_to.body_tagged:
Why did you randomly make Clay Wars?
Plan to make any maps for Avicus soon?

replies.body:
>Why did you randomly make Clay Wars?

I wanted to make a map for avicus. I decided to ignore aesthetics for the start and just focus on gameplay. After some tests of the basic layout with a bunch of people, I decided to make it look at least a little bit nicer and not just stone. So yea thats how it was made. Why? Just wanted to make a map, thats all.

>Plan to make any maps for Avicus soon?

Nope
